summary: This bill, the Accelerate Long-term Investment Growth Now Act (ALIGN Act), proposes amendments to the Internal Revenue Code of 1986. The primary focus is to allow a permanent tax deduction for investments in qualified property at the time the investment is made. Specifically, it amends Section 168(k) regarding the applicable percentage for expensing qualified property and makes conforming changes to related sections, including Section 460(c)(6)(B). The amendments are to be treated as if included in the 2017 tax law.
